content.title: Uses
content.description: Timber is priced than teak wood. Highly valued because of its beautiful figurative grain and its rich reddish mahogany brown colour. Wood is used to make guitar, idols, construction of houses. Plant is used as cattle fodder, edible and cosmetic oils, medicinal products, shade and shelter as well as providing fuelwood. Gum of this plant appears to be colourless - reddish brown translucent tears which could be used to disintegrant in tablet formulation.
